pages.text: Several mods can alter or add functionality to Thingamajigs! The mods include some notable ones, such as Create. Some additional connected visual changes can be applied to modded blocks if Athena is installed.

Create enables some recipes on the Converter's page in this book. Note that along with a Create-exclusive recipe, wheat can be exchanged for eggs if Purifying Water is below the Converter. Only when Create is installed do these recipes work.

As of 1.8.4, this mod supports some mods directly in terms of code compatibility. Notably some door behavior mods, additional wood mods and painting behavior and optimizing mods. Specific mods are not mentioned here.
The documentation for Thingamajigs goes into more depth about certain 'compat' features, read it for in-depth stuff that would otherwise take up far too many pages in this book.
